title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: An assertive approach can work out well when delegating responsibilities today. It doesnt matter if youre shaking a little on the inside as long as your outward mannerisms appear confident. Fortunately, these jitters are likely to completely disappear as you grow more comfortable in a leadership role. You know the tasks that need to be completed and who best can do the job. Assign the right people to where they will shine the most and things will tick along like clockwork. Nothing succeeds like success. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
